description:
Shane and his friend Christian moved from Toronto, Canada about a week ago in order to experience new things. They told me they are planning on staying in the United States for about six months while they work as bartenders and chase girls.
When I first met them, they had shown up with a couple of beautiful girls who were hanging all over them. It was Shane's idea to do an adult video. Christian was along for the ride and the girls... well, they waited in the lobby while the guys did their thing.
Both Shane and Christian claimed to be multi-orgasmic. They told me that if I gave them a few minutes of rest in between, they would be able to bust their nut more than once. Sure enough, as you will see, that turned out to be true.
All I can say about Shane is that he is perfect from head to toe... beautiful blue eyes, chiseled face, and muscular body.
title: Shane
